body_html: Would be nice to have an official example in the docs, showing how to use the Estimators API when some weights should be initialized from an existing checkpoint in the very first step and all others should be initialized randomly. @honkentuber
body_text: Would be nice to have an official example in the docs, showing how to use the Estimators API when some weights should be initialized from an existing checkpoint in the very first step and all others should be initialized randomly. @honkentuber
body: Would be nice to have an official example in the docs, showing how to use the Estimators API when some weights should be initialized from an existing checkpoint in the very first step and all others should be initialized randomly. @honkentuber
